articles.content: Shares of information technology major HCL Technologies tumbled over 2 percent in early trade on July 13, a day after the company reported a disappointing set of earnings for the April-June quarter.… [+3630 chars]

articles.title: Sebi puts in place regulatory framework for value chain ESG disclosures for listed entities - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Under the framework, large listed companies will have to make disclosures and obtain assurance as per 'BRSR Core' for their value chain.
articles.content:
Markets watchdog Sebi on Wednesday came out with a regulatory framework for listed entities on ESG disclosures on supply chain and assurance. ESG refers to Environment, Social and Governance.
